name: Triangle Got High
description:
He's funny. He dances. He smokes crack and gets high. He's the swaggest triangle our universe has ever known.

This game is a 3D platformer with elements of parkour, mazes, jumping and exploring. You play as the swag triangle, which is the talking Triforce from The Legend of Zelda that became a meme in 2007 thanks to YouTube user DancingTriforce.

Note: the game is currently in active development. It may and will have imperfections, bugs, and lack a proper ending. See the devlog for more info.
